Detailed Description

a menu item

Defines an item of a VSTGUI::COptionMenu

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Flags
Enumerator:
kNoFlags 
kDisabled 

item is gray and not selectable

kTitle 

item indicates a title and is not selectable

kChecked 

item has a checkmark

kSeparator 

item is a separator
